ARABIC: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌ وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ صَٰحِبَةٌ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is the Originator of the heavens and the earth. How could He have a son when He has no wife? He created all things and He has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, how could He have a son when He has no mate? He created all things, and has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He is the Originator of the heavens and the earth. How can He have a son when He has had no mate? And He has created everything and He has full knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How could the One Who is the Originator of the heavens and the earth and who has no companion, have a son? He created all things and has absolute knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The Originator of the heavens and the earth; how can He possibly have a child when, in fact, He does not have a spouse? And He has created all things; and He knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He is the Badi` (Originator) of the heavens and the earth. How can He have children when He has no wife He created all things and He is the All-Knower of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Wonderful Originator of the heavens and the earth! How could He have a son when He has no consort, and He (Himself) created everything, and He is the Knower of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Creator of the heavens and the earth -- how should He have a son, seeing that He has no consort, and He created all things, and He has knowledge of everything?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The Originator of the heavens and the earth! How can He have a child, when there is for Him no consort, when He created all things and is Aware of all things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the Originator of the heavens and the earth. How could He have a son when He has no consort? He created everything and is aware of everything!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Originator of the heavens and the earth! How should He have a son when there is for Him no spouse? And He hath created everything and He is Knower of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The originator of the heavens and the earth—how could He have a child when He has had no spouse? He created all things and He has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Him is due the primal origin of the heavens and the earth: How can He have a son when He hath no consort? He created all things, and He hath full knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He is the Originator of the heavens and the earth. How can He have children when He has no wife? He created all things and He is the All-Knower of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth. How can He have a son when He had no female companion? He created all things and has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Originator of the heavens and the earth—how can He have a son when He never had a companion? He created all things, and He has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He is] Originator of the heavens and the earth. How could He have a son when He does not have a companion and He created all things? And He is, of all things, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:101] He is, the Originator of the heavens and the earth, which He originated uniquely without precedent; how should He have a son, when He has no consort, spouse, and He created everything, that was meant to be created, and He has knowledge of all things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The Originator) the Creator (of the heavens and the earth!) He created them when they were nothing before such creation. (How can He have a child, when there is for Him no consort) no wife, (when He created all things and is Aware of all things) of all created beings?
